question: Which of the following urban cooperative bank of India became the first to convert to the small finance bank?
explanation: Shivalik Mercantile Co-operative Bank Ltd of Uttar Pradesh became the first urban cooperative bank to convert to the small finance bank. The bank was established in the year 1998 in Saharanpur, Uttar Pradesh. The name of the chairman of the bank is Mr. Yashvir Kumar Gupta.
